Help

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


 Note: Please do not add templates to this category; instead, use one of its subcategories.  Wikipedia templates grouped by encyclopedic topic, by template task    The pages listed in this category are templates. 
 This page is part of Wikipedia's administration and not part of the encyclopedia. 
show
 Further template category notes 

 This category contains pages in the template namespace. It should not be used to categorize articles or pages in other namespaces.  To add a template to this category: 
If the template has a separate documentation page (usually called "Template:template name/doc"), add [[Category:Wikipedia templates by task and topic]]to the <includeonly> section at the bottom of that page. Otherwise, add <noinclude>[[Category:Wikipedia templates by task and topic]]</noinclude>to the end of the template code, making sure it starts on the same line as the code's last character.

 

See also: Category:Wikipedia templates by topic and task




Subcategories
This category has the following 8 subcategories, out of 8 total.
C
  Category header templates by topic (9 C)E
  External link templates by topic (12 C)F

  List templates by topic (4 C, 29 P)M
  Wikipedia metatemplates by topic (5 C, 8 P)N
  Navigational boxes by topic (11 C)S
  Sidebar templates by topic (9 C)
